about_the_game:
PLAY THIS DEMO ON STEAM NEXT FEST - FROM JUNE 19th TO 26th!


Can you control chance?

Find out in Wish Us Luck. A single-player interactive fiction with multiple endings, in which you must take hard decisions to make it in the big city.

You play three characters: a down-on-his-luck driver addicted to gambling; a young actress who can’t make ends meet; a soccer star encumbered by the pressure of fame. Three strangers struggling to thrive on an eventful day. Their fates, intertwined by the puzzling cogs of chance. A minor choice you make for one may produce dire consequences to the others.

In this demo, you get to chose which character you're gonna play first. So pick your favorite and get ready to make hard decisions.

Features:

  • - multiplot narrative - three interconnected stories
  • - immersive story with depth and lifelike characters
  • - unique artstyle
  • - hours of replayability - choose different paths and meet completely new characters

Meet your characters


Samuel, Alice and Anderson. The fates of these three people are in your hands.
Wanna learn their stories?


Alice is a young and talented actress who can't make ends meet. Waitress by day and magician's assistant by night, she's on the verge of losing both jobs and face eviction. Could things get any worse?



Rising soccer star "Andy 10" is finally back to his hometown... to play finals against his former team. Half the city loves him, the other half calls him a traitor.
Pressured by his team, his agent and fans, he begins to question everything he's ever achieved.



Samuel is an app driver. Once he used his skills as a statistician to gamble, and it paid off. But after a losing streak, he lost all his money and his wife. Oh, a loan shark is on his tail, too. Now he's going to risk what little he's got to regain his family.

So how do I play?


Meet and engage in conversation with many intriguing characters.



Explore the city and its lively locations.



Use apps to express yourself, communicate and make a living.



Dozens of characters to meet. Will you discover them all?



And remember:
Every little decision you make matters.

short_description: Hello, Next Festers! If you enjoy multi-plot narrative games, welcome to Gude City! Wish Us Luck is an interactive fiction fueled by your hard decisions. Play three strangers whose fates are intertwined by the mysterious cogs of chance. Demo available only until June 26th.
